question: What is the correct order of steps to determine the significance of a salary difference between men and women based on the video's explanation?
candidates: A. State null hypothesis, calculate p-value, draw sample, compare p-value to alpha.
B. Draw sample, compare p-value to alpha, calculate p-value, state null hypothesis.
C. Calculate p-value, state null hypothesis, compare p-value to alpha, draw sample.
D. State null hypothesis, draw sample, calculate p-value, compare p-value to alpha.
E. Draw sample, state null hypothesis, calculate p-value, compare p-value to alpha.
F. State null hypothesis, draw sample, compare p-value to alpha, calculate p-value.
G. Draw sample, calculate p-value, state null hypothesis, compare p-value to alpha.
H. Calculate p-value, compare p-value to alpha, state null hypothesis, draw sample.
I. Compare p-value to alpha, state null hypothesis, draw sample, calculate p-value.
J. State null hypothesis, calculate p-value, compare p-value to alpha, draw sample.
answer: D. State null hypothesis, draw sample, calculate p-value, compare p-value to alpha.

question: At 9:30 in the video, the force exerted by the fluid on the slanted gate is calculated. What is the significance of calculating the force F_R?
candidates: A. To find the weight of the gate.
B. To calculate the torque required to open the gate.
C. To determine the density of the fluid.
D. To calculate the angle of the gate with respect to the horizontal.
E. To find the hinge reaction at point O.
F. To verify the slant height of the gate.
G. To determine the pressure variation along the gate.
H. To calculate the horizontal component of the hydrostatic force.
I. To determine the total hydrostatic force acting on the gate.
J. None of the above
answer: I. To determine the total hydrostatic force acting on the gate.

question: What is the significance of a "cold" nodule on a thyroid scan?
candidates: A. Raises suspicions of thyroid cancer
B. Indicates a toxic adenoma
C. It is usually benign
D. Requires no further investigation
answer: A. Raises suspicions of thyroid cancer
